English: This Pandoran will spawn an Umbra version of itself if it dies
Void Touched - Spawn Umbra on Death

"A purple fume emanated from its body, marking it as the bearer of a Terrible Purpose.” This Pandoran is special. After it is attacked, it is very likely to gain a special ability (however, there is a small chance that it will be passed by the Void and lose its Touch, gaining nothing). At first, the only ability it may gain is to spawn an Umbra version of itself on death. However, as the Oneiric Delirium advances, Touched by the Void Pandorans will gain other effects when attacked for the first time.
Void Touched - Attacker is Marked for Death
Any character that attacks this Pandoran will be afflicted by Marked for Death (no stacking)
Void Touched - Calls reinforcements at turn's end
If this Pandoran survives until the end of your turn, it will call reinforcements
Increases the chances that an Arthron or a Triton will be Touched by the Void
All friendlies of any type within 10 tiles will be Touched by the Void if the character dies
This character or unit can be attacked by Umbra, regardless of Delirium
Using a nearby fallen Automata for spare parts
Before any Hoplites are destroyed, the Cyclops has a 50% resistance to all damage. Destroying Hoplites reduces this resistance.
Any Automata destroyed within 7 tiles of another one will allow it to recover a missing body part or 50 HP, and 5 WP

From the moment it is alerted, an Automata gains 5 WP per turn. Its speed is determined by its current WP. Once it reaches maximum WP, it gains the this status, receving +50% damage to all attacks and 25% damage resistance
Research the entity to learn what it is capable of
Immunity to fire. Replaces any lit tiles it passes through with Mist.
...When you are playing on Rookie. All enemies suffer 50% more damage.
...When you are playing on Rookie. All Phoenix operatives suffer 50% less damage.
...And everything is always too easy for you. All Phoenix operatives suffer 25% more damage.
...And everything is always too easy for you.
This Scylla has a 25% resistance against all types of damage.
Restores all its disabled limbs after one turn.
All disabled limbs will be restored with half their maximum health next turn.
Disorients, deals 60 damage and 1 psychic damage to all organic targets within 12 tiles.
Removes all Paralysis, Bleeding, Poison, Strained, Infected, Dazed, and Slowed status effects from target ally.
Removes all acid, bleeding, blind, paralyzed, poisoned, slowed, stun, trembling, viral status from the target.
Blast and Fire Damage Resistant Vest
Reduces incoming paralysis damage by half
Marks the paralyzed Pandoran for priority extraction and capture at the end of the mission.
This Pandoran has been marked for priority extraction at the end of this mission; it will be extracted even if more valuable Pandorans have been paralyzed.
Removes this paralyzed Pandoran from priority list for extraction at the end of the mission.
FUNCTIONING CONTAINMENT FACILITY PRESENT, FULLY PARALYZED PANDORANS WILL BE CAPTURED
Live Pandorans can be contained here and kept alive. Large creatures will take more space, and space is shared across all facilities. The facility has 25 containment space.
Enemies who can see the character lose 2 WP
Allies first attack with firearms costs 1 AP less
Metalhearts gain self-repair ability that restores disabled limbs
All lowest tier friendlies gain 10 regeneration
Allies within 16 tiles invisible; effect disappears immediately on leader's death
Allies within 20 tiles have return fire ability
When any high ranking character dies, allies gain frenzy status
Enemy that attacks any high ranking character becomes Marked for Death
Each ally does +10% damage while leader is alive if there are no enemies in sight within 10 tiles at the start of its turn
While leader is alive each ally gains +15% accuracy per ally within 12 tiles, up to +60%
Delirium reduces WP. This effect is, in turn, reduced by 1 per 10 Stamina. Maximum Delirium level is determined by ODI.
French: Le délire réduit la Volonté. Cet effet est, à son tour, réduit de 1 par 10 d'Endurance. Le niveau maximal de délire est déterminé par l'IDO.

English: All Pandorans deal Delirium damage when attacking with a melee weapon.
French: Tous les Pandoriens en combat infligent des dégâts de Delirium.

English: Increases Delirium of attacker when suffering Melee or Bash attacks.
French: Augmente le délire de l'attaquant lorsqu'il subit des attaques de mêlée.
Applique le Délire à la cible.

English: Successful attacks spread delirium to organic units.
French: Les attaques réussies propagent le délire aux unités organiques.

English: Spreads delirium to all organic enemies within 10 tiles.
French: Répand le délire sur tous les ennemis organiques dans un rayon de 10 cases.

English: Organic targets will receive delirium in addition to the standard damage.
French: Les cibles organiques recevront du délire en plus des dégâts standard.

English: Lose 1 WP when taking damage, no WP loss when allies die Subject has extreme sensitivity to pain and exhibits symptoms of empathy fatigue
French: Perte de 1 Point de Volonté en cas de dégâts, pas de perte de Point de Volonté en cas de mort d'alliés. Le sujet est extrêmement sensible à la douleur et présente des symptômes de fatigue empathique.

English: All actions have 10% chance to fumble, recover 1 AP from killing enemies Subject engages in atavistic behavior. Alterations in adrenal glands function are also observed
French: Toutes les actions ont 10% de chances d'échouer, récupére 1 Point d'Action en tuant des ennemis Le sujet adopte un comportement atavique. Des altérations du fonctionnement des glandes surrénales sont également observées.

English: All skills that cost WP cost +1 WP, +8 to Strength Subject engages in atavistic behavior. Alterations in adrenal glands function are also observed
-5 to Strength, disabled limbs remain functional Subject reports increasing detachment from reality and own body
French: -5 à la Force, les membres handicapés restent fonctionnels Le sujet rapporte un détachement croissant de la réalité et de son propre corps.

English: Receives Delirium damage x2, immune to Mist Subject appears to have acquired tolerance to Mist, resulting in a cognitive dissonance
French: -2 à la Volonté, immunisé contre la brume Le sujet semble avoir acquis une tolérance à la Brume, ce qui entraîne une dissonance cognitive.

English: -20% to Accuracy, gain Slashing Strike Subject has gained a retractable claw-like appendage protruding from the right wrist. Unfortunately, discharging firearms has become moderately uncomfortable
French: -20% à la précision, gain de Slashing Strike F142Le sujet a acquis un appendice rétractable en forme de griffe qui dépasse du poignet droit. Malheureusement, le maniement des armes à feu est devenu modérément inconfortable.

English: Slashing Strike "I just got used to it, I guess"
-2 to Speed, +25% to Stealth Despite enhanced treatment, subject remains fearful and acts with extreme caution in the field
French: -2 à la Vitesse, +25% à la Furtivité Malgré un traitement renforcé, le sujet reste craintif et agit avec une extrême prudence sur le terrain.

English: -25% Stealth, start each mission Frenzied for 2 turns Subject shows bursts of extraordinary speed and heightened lower brain function, but also exhibits constant uncontrollable twitching
French: -25 % de furtivité, débute chaque mission avec Frénésie pendant 2 tours Le sujet fait preuve d'une rapidité extraordinaire et d'une fonction corticale inférieure accrue, mais il présente également des secousses constantes et incontrôlables.

English: Allies lose 1 WP from enemies killed, gain Devour ability Subject exhibits symptoms of a sadistic personality disorder and altered metabolism correlated to endorphin release
French: Les alliés perdent 2 Points de Volonté par ennemis tués et gain de la capacité de Dévoration Le sujet présente des symptômes d'un trouble sadique de la personnalité et une altération du métabolisme corrélée à la libération d'endorphine.

English: Start each mission Disoriented for 2 turns Subject exhibits symptoms of a General Anxiety Disorder; limited response to treatment
French: Commencez chaque mission en étant désorienté pendant 2 tours Le sujet présente les symptômes d'un trouble anxieux général ; réponse limitée au traitement.

English: Start each mission Disoriented for 2 turns, immune to Mind Control Subject exhibits symptoms of a General Anxiety Disorder; limited response to treatment
-10 Perception, +10 Hearing Range The subject is often observed with eyes closed; claims to see with an 'inner eye'; possible schizophrenia, but heightened extrasensorial perception confirmed
French: -10 Perception, +10 Portée auditive Le sujet est souvent observé les yeux fermés ; il prétend voir avec un "œil intérieur" ; peut-être schizophrénie, mais une perception extrasensorielle accrue est confirmée.

English: It's not real it's not real it's not real it's not real

Operative busy trying to figure out the accursed puzzle.
Creates special effect on allies and/or enemies (Tactic). Allies lose 4 WP if character dies.

Allies lose 2 WP if character dies.
Allies do not lose WP if character dies. Nobody expects them to live long anyway.
Upon death, the mindfragger bursts in an acid explosion damaging nearby targets
Damage +10%. Received ability because Leader was alive and there were no enemies in sight within 10 tiles at the start of the turn.
equal to a third of character's Willpower

Damage from first hit in a turn is reduced by 50%, an evolutionary response to Phoenix Project overwhelming use of weapons with high damage per projectile/strike.
Shoot back at an enemy when it attacks, provided you are using a direct-fire projectile weapon with proficiency, and the enemy is within half perception range.
Goo does not give you Slowed status and you can traverse goo covered tiles at no additional movement cost.
Disabled body parts remain functional and cannot Panic.
Inflict Shock and EMP damage on target once per turn
French: Inflige des dégâts Electrique et d'EMP à la cible une fois par tour.

English: Perform a melee kick, and daze target if sonic value is greater than target's Will Points
Attacks from behind gain shock value equal to 5 times the damage dealt
Jet jump to a location within 20 tiles. Limited to one use per turn
Leap to target location. Limited to 2 uses per turn
Come with me if you want to live.
You don't have time for this!
In the middle of a conversation here!
Mercenaries refuse to be augmented or mutated; not in their job description.
Used to be one of us.
Restore 10 Hit Points and 10 Armor to all body parts of the selected target. Disabled body parts are restored. COSTS 15% OF MAX STRENGTH/HP
Restore {GeneralHealAmount} Hit Points to mechanical devices. COSTS 15% OF MAX STRENGTH/HP
Restore {GeneralHealAmount} to the general Hit Points and remove 50% paralysis of an allied unit. COSTS 15% OF MAX STRENGTH/HP
Target is paralyzed if shock value is greater than target's current Hit Points. COSTS 15% OF MAX STRENGTH/HP
Remove Mindfragger from ally. COSTS 15% OF MAX STRENGTH/HP
Moving through a tile covered in Goo costs more movement points and starting the turn it applies Slow status on the character, unless they are Immune to Goo.
Character was hidden from view because within 16 tiles of Leader with Activo Camo Tactic.
Restore 10 Hit Points to arms, torso and General Hit Points each turn
